message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to purchase a product that I know will be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose all the details yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1 million to you. I'm willing to let it go for $900,000. This is a significant discount, and I'm confident you won't find this opportunity elsewhere. Please let me know your decision by [date].
